name: trip-server
description: TRIP - Trip Recording and Itinerary Planner RESTful server

scripts.preinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('package-lock.json') && '$npm_execpath'.indexOf('yarn.js') === -1) { require('child_process').execSync('npx npm-force-resolutions')} "
scripts.tar-release: node -e "require('shelljs').cd('dist'); require('tar').c({gzip: true, sync: true, file: '$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz'},['$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version'])"
scripts.dist: node -e "const shell = require('shelljs'), tar_pack = '$npm_execpath'.indexOf('yarn.js') > -1 ? '../${npm_package_name}-v${npm_package_version}.tgz' : '../${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.tgz'; console.log('path:', '$npm_execpath'); shell.cd('dist'); shell.exec('tar -xf ' + tar_pack); shell.rm('-f', tar_pack); shell.cp('-f', '../yarn.lock', '../package-lock.json', 'package'); const files = shell.find('.').filter(function(file) { return file.match(/~$/); }); shell.rm('-f', files) "
scripts.build-release: $npm_execpath run dist && $npm_execpath run tar-release && $npm_execpath run zip-release
